command.title: Filtrado de datos con KQL (WHERE)
command.description: Aplica filtros de nivel de fila antes de procesar agregaciones u ordenamientos. [KQL Base Table: Bikestream; Group By: Neighbourhood]

part.desc: Filtra el flujo de datos para incluir solo registros donde la columna Neighbourhood es igual a "Chelsea".

command.full: Bikestream | where Neighbourhood == "Chelsea" | summarize ["Total Number of Bikes"] = sum(No_Bikes) by Neighbourhood
